channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Poorly lit street, 1st October
item.description:
There are simply too few lights on Cabbell Street, making it dangerous after sunset. The ones there currently are too dim, and there are too few of them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Cabbell Street, Paddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of rubbish daily outside 96 Belgrave Road, 1st October
item.description:
I have written to council about this now. It is not being collected for some reason. I am reporting here to remove this rubbish as it sometimes sits for over 24 hours outside our building. Almost daily issue!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90, Belgrave Road, Pimlico, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bags of rubbish left on the pavement, 1st October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Birkbeck Place, Tulse Hill, London

item.title: Walkways never being swept, 1st October
item.description:

item.title: Dirty bins, 1st October

item.title: Electric box with dangerous wires exposed, 1st October
item.description:
Wide open box with lots of wires hanging out. Unsafe for kids (I have 7yo twins). Outside 35 Avondale Road at corner of Abingdon. Needs fixing and shutting. I moved in on 23rd July and it’s been like that since. Please come close the box.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Avondale Road, Finchley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 6 Cleve Road, 1st October
item.description:
A sink hole appeared approximately 6 weeks ago with a constant puddle of water inside. I noticed it in July as vehicles passing over it would splash nearby parked cars/people. As time has gone by and the problem has not been resolved it looks much worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Cleve Road, South Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
